name: Stickman Car: Zombie Shooting
description:
It is the stickman zombie apocalypse! Drive your car and shoot the zombies ( the zombie stick men also drive cars!!!! THEY ARE CAR ZOMBIES!!!)

warning: contains lots of blood and gore ( which is awesome)

- 10 Levels
- Multiple cars
- Car simulation + Shooting
- Fully 3d stickman, car and stickman zombies
- Easy controls for driving, shooting and killing

do not crash :) Anything that is still walking - kill it!
